titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the Eric Chenoweth papers
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by G. Malgorzata Szudelski

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2017-08-30T10:27-0700
profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid is written in English

change.item: Added inventory created by Malgosia (Justyna Szulc).
Updated to add incremental materials boxes.

did.abstract: Correspondence, reports, memoranda, grant proposals, conference proceedings, press releases, bulletins, financial records, lists, printed matter, photographs, and videorecordings relating to activities of the Committee in Support of Solidarity in the United States, and to human rights conditions in Poland; and to activities of the Institute for Democracy in Eastern Europe in promoting democracy in Eastern Europe. Includes records of these organizations.

origination.label: Contributor
origination.corpname: Committee in Support of Solidarity (New York, N.Y.).

origination.label: Contributor
origination.corpname: Institute for Democracy in Eastern Europe.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Boxes 30-37, 71-73, and 80-87 are closed. The rest of the collection is open for research.

The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items, computer media, and digital files. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos, films, or digital files during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Eric Chenoweth papers, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Materials were acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 2014.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Eric Chenoweth served as executive director for the Committee in Support of Solidarity (CSS) from 1981 to 1988. The CSS was created by both Irena Lasota and Chenoweth, who both later organized the Institute for Democracy in Eastern Europe. Later, Chenoweth served as co-director for the Institute for Democracy in Eastern Europe.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, reports, memoranda, grant proposals, conference proceedings, press releases, bulletins, financial records, lists, printed matter, photographs, and videorecordings relating to activities of the Committee in Support of Solidarity in the United States, and to human rights conditions in Poland; and to activities of the Institute for Democracy in Eastern Europe in promoting democracy in Eastern Europe. Includes records of these organizations.
